CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK( HouseNotifyParty__r.AccountNameENG__c )), HouseNotifyParty__r.AccountNameENG__c , NULL) + " " + BR()& IF(NOT(ISBLANK(HouseNotifyParty__r.BillingStreet)), HouseNotifyParty__r.BillingStreet , NULL) + " " + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(HouseNotifyParty__r.BillingCity)), HouseNotifyParty__r.BillingCity , NULL) + " " + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(HouseNotifyParty__r.BillingState)), HouseNotifyParty__r.BillingState, NULL) + " " + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(HouseNotifyParty__r.BillingPostalCode)), ", " + HouseNotifyParty__r.BillingPostalCode , NULL) + " " + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(HouseNotifyParty__r.BillingCountry)), HouseNotifyParty__r.BillingCountry, NULL) + " " + BR()& IF(NOT(ISBLANK(HouseNotifyParty__r.Phone)), " " + "TEL:" +" "+ HouseNotifyParty__r.Phone, NULL)
CustomField.label: House Notify's Detail Information
